## TransactionEvent type

`TransactionEvent` represents document events that occur within a single transaction (e.g., doc.update).

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare type TransactionEvent<P extends Indexable = Indexable> = Array<DocEvent<P>>;
```
**References:** [Indexable](./yorkie-js-sdk.indexable.md)<!-- -->, [DocEvent](./yorkie-js-sdk.docevent.md)
